Field Detail

inputSessionDescription

protected final javax.sdp.SessionDescription inputSessionDescription
The SDP description of the multicast presentation that will be reflected. This description is used to setup the endpoint(s) required to receive the multicast RTP/RTCP streams. The original SDP description must be transformed into a new description that clients can use to connect to the reflector. The new description is sent in response to a DESCRIBE request.
